name: Song For You给你的歌
lyric:
A Song For You

I've been so many places in my life and time
I've sung a lot of songs, I've made some bad rhyme
I've acted out my life in stages
With ten thousand people watching
But we're alone now and I'm singing this song for you

I know your image of me is what I hope to be
I've treated you unkindly, but baby, can't you see
There's no one more important to me
Baby can't you please see through me
Cause we're alone now and I'm singing the song for you

You taught me precious secrets
The truth with holding nothing
You came out in front and I was hiding
Now I'm so much better
If my words don't come together
Listen to the melody cause my love's in there hiding

I love you in a place where there is no space or time
I love you for my life, cause you're a friend of mine
And when my life is over, remember when we were together
We were alone and I was singing the song for you

You taught me precious secrets
The truth with holding nothing
You came out in front and I was hiding
Now I'm so much better
If my words don't come together
Listen to the melody cause my love's in there hiding
I love you in a place where there is no space or time
I love you for my life, cause you're a friend of mine
When my life is over, remember when we were together
We were alone and I was singing the song for you
We were alone and I was singing the song for you
singing the song, singing the song,singing the song...

comments.brief:
她的气息容易不稳定，音色抒情又伤感，混合起来造就了她独特的风格

来自iPhone客户端

棒

来自iPhone客户端

author.name: 虾米用户
author.motto: 隔离是种很强悍的防御

comments.brief:
喜欢这种曲风，喜欢她的声音
慢热型歌曲

选自顺子《Songs For Love》

这些歌都很好听，但都很难唱，听得出来，顺子唱得很用心，但是我觉得，她的声线，似乎并不适合这里所有的歌曲。而且，似乎在感情的融合上，有一些问题，顺子并没有表现出这些歌的精髓，有点只是在唱的感觉。所以这张，并不是顺子的最好表现，我并不是很喜欢。
